Translations.Text: Bhabo tarakara katha, yakhana ta asta yaya
tomadera sangi dosa-truti karena na, ara tini bipathe'o yana na
ara tini icchamata kono katha balena na.
E'ikhana pratyadista ha'oya pratyadesabani bai to naya
tamke sikhiyechena birata saktimana
balabiryera adhikari. Kaje'i tini paripurnataya paumchalena.
Ara tini rayechena urdhba digante.
Tarapara tini sannikate elena, atahpara tini abanata karalena
takhana tini du'i dhanukera byabadhane ra'ilena, athaba ara'o kache.
Takhana tini tamra bandara kache pratyadesa karalena ya tini pratyadesa karena.
Hrdaya asbikara kare ni ya tini dekhechilena tate.
Tomara ki tabe tamra sange bitarka karabe ya tini dekhechena se-sanbandhe
ara tini niscaya'i tamke dekhechilena an'ya eka abatarane
duradigantera sidarah‌-gachera kache
tara kache ache cira-upabhogya udyana.
Dekho! Ya acchadana kare ta dheke diyechila sidarah‌-gachake
drsti bibhranta haya ni ebam ta sima chariye'o yaya ni.
Tini niscaya'i tamra prabhura srestha nidarsanagulora madhye ceye dekhechilena.
Tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha lata o'uyaya
ebam manata, -- trtiya arekati
tomadera jan'ya putrasantana ara tamra jan'ya kan'ya
e to bara'i asangata bantana

Tara namabali bai to naya, ya tomara namakarana karecha -- tomara o tomadera purbapurusara, yadera jan'ya allah kono sanada pathana ni. Tara to sudhu anumanera ebam ya tadera antara kamana kare tara'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera prabhura kacha theke tadera kache pathanirdesa abasya'i ese geche.
Athaba manusera jan'ya ki ta'i thakabe ya se kamana kare
kinta sesata to allah‌ra, ara prathamata'o.
Ara mahakasamandale kata ye phiris‌ta rayeche yadera suparisa kono kaje asabe na yataksana na allah anumati dena tara jan'ya yake tini iccha karena o tini santasta hayechena.
Nihsandeha yara parakale bisbasa kare na tara phiris‌tadera nama deya meyedera name.
Ara e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i. Tara to anumanera'i anusarana karache, ara nihsandeha satyera birud'dhe anumane kono labha haya na.
Sejan'ya take upeksa karo ye amadera upadesa theke phire yaya ara duniyara jibana chara ara kichu caya na.
E'iti'i tadera jnanera sesasima. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i bhala janena take ye tara patha theke bhrasta hayeche, ara tini'i bhala janena ye satpathaprapta.

Ara mahakasamandale ya-kichu ache ebam ya-kichu ache prthibite ta allah‌ra'i, yena yara manda kaja kareche tadera tini pratiphala dite parena ya tara kareche sejan'ya, ara yara satkaja kareche tadera tini bhalabhabe pratidana dite parena.

Yara barjana kare bara bara papacara o aslila kaja -- mukhomukhi ha'oya bhinna -- tomara prabhu paritrane niscaya'i aparisima. Tini tomadera bhalo janena yakhana theke tini tomadera srstira sucana karechena mati theke, ara yakhana tomara chile tomadera mayera pete bhranarupe. Ata'eba tomara tomadera nijedera gunagana karo na. Tini'i bhalo janena take ye dharmabhiruta abalanbana kare.
Tumi ki tabe take dekhecha ye phire yaya
Ara yatsaman'ya dana kare ebam nirdayata dekhaya
tara kache ki adrsya samparke jnana rayeche phale se dekhata pacche
athaba take ki sambada de'oya haya ni musara granthe ya ache se-sanbandhe
ebam ibrahima sanbandhe yini sampurnarupe pratipalana karechilena
yatha kono bharabahi an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
ara e'i ye manusera jan'ya kichu'i thakabe na yara jan'ya se cesta na ka’re
ara e'i ye, tara pracesta acire'i drstigocara habe
tarapara take pratidana de'oya habe paripurna pratidane
ara e'i ye, tomara prabhura dike'i hacche sesa-sima
ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ara tini'i kamdana
ara e'i ye, tini'i marena o tini'i bamcana.
Ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karechena joraya-joraya nara o nari
sukrakita theke yakhana take bin'yasa kara haya
ara e'i ye, tamra upare'i rayeche punaraya ut'thanera dayitba
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhanadaulata dena o sukha-samrd'dhi pradana karena
ara e'i ye, tini'i si'ra naksatrera prabhu
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhbansa karechilena pracinakalera'ada-jatike
ara chamuda-jati'o, ta'i tini baki rakhena ni
ara nuha-era lokadala'o era age. Nihsandeha tara chila -- tara'i to chila atyanta atyacari o bejaya abadhya.
Ara ulate phela saharagulo -- tini dhbansa karechilena
phale tadera tini dheke diyechilena ya dheke deya.
Ata'eba tomara prabhura kona anugraha samparke tumi badanubada karabe
pracinakalera satarkakaridera madhye theke ini hacchena ekajana satarkakari.
Asanna ghatana samagata
eti dura karabara mato allah chara ara ke'u ne'i.
E'i bibrtite tomara ki tajjaba haccha
ara tomara ki hasacha, tomara ki ara kamdabe na
ara tomara to helaphela karacha.
Ata'eba allah‌ra prati sijada karo ebam upasana karo.
